features: Cooling Gel Infusion: Experience unparalleled comfort and support with the Three Mares Memory Foam Gel Pillow, designed with innovative gel-infused memory foam that dissipates heat, ensuring a refreshing and comfortable sleep environment.

Integrated Ventilation Holes: In addition, we added thermo-regulating ventilation holes to the pillow to support even heat distribution. In order to achieve the perfect sleeping experience, unpack your pillow immediately as it needs some time to unfold.
Adapts to Head Shape and Weight: This pillow is specially designed to mold to the individual shape and weight of your head, providing personalized support and enhancing your sleep comfort.

Breathable and Hypoallergenic: The breathable cover made from premium-quality materials promotes airflow, while the hypoallergenic properties help protect against allergens, ensuring a clean and healthy sleep surface.
Durable and Easy to Maintain: Crafted with long-lasting materials, the removable and machine-washable cover makes maintenance a breeze, keeping your pillow fresh and hygienic.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Discover the Blissful Comfort of Three Mares Memory Foam Gel Pillow! Indulge in Tranquility and Unmatched Support! Innovative Gel-Infused Memory Foam: The Three Mares Pillow's gel-infused memory foam adapts to your body's contours, providing customized support and soothing pressure points for enhanced comfort. CertiPUR-US Certified: Rest assured knowing that the Three Mares Memory Foam Gel Pillow is made with high-quality materials that meet strict standards for performance, durability, and environmental safety.

Your advantages at a glance: Thermo-regulationEnhanced spinal alignmentPressure point reliefCooling comfortAdapts to head shape and weightBreathable and hypoallergenicDurable and long-lastingEasy maintenance and cleaningPromotes deep sleepLuxurious pillow experience Your Extras: Supportive memory foamGel-infused for temperature regulationVentilation holesContoured ergonomic designCertiPUR-US certified materialsVersatile for different sleeping positions Product details: Available in 2 sizes: 24 x 15.8 x 5.1 in 27.5 x 15.8 x 5.1 in Material: Memory foam: Polyurethane Inner Cover: Polyester Outer cover: Polyester

Say Goodbye to Restless Nights! Ergonomic Design: The pillow's contoured shape aligns your head, neck, and shoulders, promoting proper spinal alignment and reducing discomfort for a more restorative sleep. Embrace the Ultimate Hug for Your Head! Temperature Regulation: The gel-infused memory foam and ventilation holes as well as the breathable cover work together to dissipate heat, keeping you cool and comfortable throughout the night, regardless of the season. Transform Your Bedtime Routine! Suitable for All Sleeping Positions: Whether you're a back, side, or stomach sleeper, the Three Mares Memory Foam Gel Pillow provides optimal support and comfort to accommodate your preferred sleeping position.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dare to Mare
reviews.reviewText: I’m officially off the standard pillow and dreaming of “greener pastures”. I’ve tried memory foam and the likes in the past and after “tirelessly” listening to my wife rave about this pillow I finally made the purchase. Surprise surprise - she was right.THANK YOU

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This pillow is a game changer
reviews.reviewText: I rarely write reviews. I have tried so many pillows and have had little luck with memory foam before now. After allowing the pillow to air out a few days, I started sleeping on it.The thickness is perfect for me - most memory foam pillows that I have tried previously are too thick (or rigid) and hurt my neck. It has the right amount of “squish” and provides support while still molding to my head/neck.I slept on the Three Mares pillow for 4 nights beautifully! On the 5th night, I slept on my old pillow just for comparison. After using my old pillow, I woke up with a crick in my neck! I immediately switched back to the Three Mares pillow the following night and my neck felt so much better the next morning. I’m in my second week of using the Three Mares pillow and it’s exactly what I’ve been looking for!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Kept me cool!
reviews.reviewText: The pillow did what it said that it would do. It kept me cool and comfy while I slept. The pillow was nice and gave me decent support. It was overall a good pillow.I normally do not know the dimensions of the pillows that I buy as I only look at "Queen", "King" and sizes like that. The 27in one(the largest one that they have on amazon) is the same size as my queen just in case anyone was wondering.The cover on the pillow was nice and the zipper was very small which was also nice as sometimes the zipper is so big that I can feel it when I am using the pillow.Useability: Very easy. Pull it out and let it relax for a while to get to it's full "fluffiness". I left mine out for about 4 hours. There is no smell which is very nice and some memory foam can have a very chemical smell.I did take one star off as it seemed a little thinner then what I was expecting in a normal pillow and I wished that they would have listed the pillow sizes in the normal "Queen", "King" sizes instead of actuial dimensions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this pillow. It fits my neck perfectly and forms to it well. The memory foam feels like a cloud!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have a hard time finding a pillow that doesn’t hurt my neck. This one is not too big, not too flat… it’s the right size. It molds to the shape of my neck and I wake up with no neck pain. I love them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and fluffy
reviews.reviewText: I got this pillow because I have a hard time sleeping due to my current pillows being too hard or too soft. This pillow is just wright as the memory foam does a good job adapting to your head and neck. The pillow arrived in a vacuum bag and once opened it starts to fluff up. I let the pillow sit for about 15 hours prior to using it just to be sure it relaxed to its normal form. After using this pillow just shy of 2 months I can definitely say that I have no complaints. The memory foam expands to its normal shape every time you move around on the pillow which doesn’t leave room for flat or hard surfaces. This pillow also stays cool and does not absorb body heat which is also nice. I tend to sleep a lot on my side and the comfort this pillow provides between my arm and face are just great. I almost have up on foam pillows until I got the three mares pillow. It’s well worth the asking price.Pros-SoftComfortableFluffyCoolCons-N/A

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great memory foam pillow, I feel like it gives great support to my neck and head.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cool and comfy
reviews.reviewText: This is a quality pillow and is exactly as described by the seller. The foam is firm and the pillow stays cool, which is important for me as I tend to get hot when I sleep. For me, as a side sleeper, it is just a bit too thin. I use it on top of another pillow in order to support my neck and shoulder. Haven’t had such good sleep in quite a while.
